about_the_game:
This is the demo for the game Chess Twist, where you can play with a few boards.

The full game offers the additional features:
- hundreds of procedurally generated boards
- multiplayer
- games with timer (10 minute, 5 minutes)
detailed_description:
This is the demo for the game Chess Twist, where you can play with a few boards.

The full game offers the additional features:
- hundreds of procedurally generated boards
- multiplayer
- games with timer (10 minute, 5 minutes)
name: Chess Twist Demo
short_description: a demo of Chess Twist, because Chess isn't hard enough
